Generation IV.Diamond: As a protective technique, it can completely freeze its fur to make its hairs stand like needles.
Generation IV.Pearl: As a protective technique, it can completely freeze its fur to make its hairs stand like needles.
Generation IV.Platinum: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It causes small ice crystals to form by lowering the temperature of the surrounding atmosphere.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It causes small ice crystals to form by lowering the temperature of the surrounding atmosphere.

Generation V.Black: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.
Generation V.White: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.
Generation V.Black 2: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.
Generation V.White 2: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.

Generation VI.X: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.
Generation VI.Y: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.

Generation VII.Sun: It can control its body temperature at will. This enables it to freeze the moisture in the atmosphere, creating flurries of diamond dust.
Generation VII.Moon: It freezes its fur into icicles, spiky and sharp, and tackles its prey.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It protects itself by freezing its fur into sharp needles. It can drop its body temperature below –75 degrees Fahrenheit .
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It can instantaneously freeze any moisture that's around it, creating ice pellets to shoot at its prey.

Generation VIII.Sword: Any who become captivated by the beauty of the snowfall that Glaceon creates will be frozen before they know it.
Generation VIII.Shield: The coldness emanating from Glaceon causes powdery snow to form, making it quite a popular Pokémon at ski resorts.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: As a defense mechanism, it can completely freeze its fur to make its hairs stand out like needles.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: As a defense mechanism, it can completely freeze its fur to make its hairs stand out like needles.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Glaceon is able to lower its body temperature very quickly. It freezes the atmosphere, creating diamond dust that glitters like gems while it flutters and dances around.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It can control its body temperature at will. This enables it to freeze the moisture in the atmosphere, creating flurries of diamond dust.
Generation IX.Violet: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.
